CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 30, 1953, pg. 22, reads: "Hereford Dancers Are Tops in 'Show of Shows' - Victor Hereford and His Creative Dancers lived up to their superlative advance billing Monday evening when they presented their 'Show of Shows' at Schenley High School. Here are two scenes from the performance. [captions are on incorrect images in print]... Walter Mayes and Alberta Thompson, two youngsters who had parts in the play are shown in a Hawaiian number... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Dancers Alberta Thompson and Walter Mayes in Caribbean costume performing in Victor Hereford and His Creative Dancers's "Show of Shows" dance program on stage in Schenley High School auditorium
